title: Hebei Province steel sector PMI seen at 42.3 in August
content:
Published on Tue, 08 Sep 2015  29 times viewed 
  
In August this year, the purchasing managers' index (PMI) of the steel sector in China’s Hebei Province increased to 42.3 up 1.6 percentage points month on month, rising to its highest level of the past three months, as announced by the Hebei Provinc........more
